title: Two dead, five injured in Thanamalwila accident
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Two people died and five others were injured when a three wheeler met with an accident in the Sooriyara area in Thanamalwila today (4).
Police Spokesperson, SSP Nihal Thalduwa stated that 9 people were traveling in the three wheeler at the time of the accident.
The police stated that a three wheeler traveling from Udawalawe to Thanamalwila had veered off the road and collided with a tree.
